title: Login & Register pages with header auth UI
description: Create login and register pages for Baby Bliss e-commerce. Frontend-only (no backend). Update header to show login/register when logged out, profile when logged in. Register fields: name, email, phone, password, confirm password. Must match pink pastel theme and pass CI/CD.

comments.author: Sisyphus
comments.text: Created prd.md with 6 tasks, 8 success criteria. Scope: login page, register page, auth context, header auth UI, auth icons, CI/CD validation.

title: About page - Trang Về chúng tôi
description: Xây dựng giao diện trang About (/about) cho website Baby Bliss e-commerce. Đảm bảo chuẩn style pink pastel OKLCH theme, đầy đủ thông tin về thương mại điện tử bán hàng online (mission, story, team, values, stats, CTA). Pass CI/CD (lint, format:check, build).
close_reason: Shipped: About page with 7 sections, SEO metadata, responsive design, OKLCH theme. All CI gates pass (lint/format/build). Review clean.

close_reason: Shipped: all 7 PRD tasks pass, TypeScript + Build + Prettier green. CartContext with useReducer, header dynamic badge, addToCart wired in ProductCard/Modal/DetailPage, cart page at /cart with Baby Bliss styling.
